fallback.explanation: I don't know this one! Please contact the devs or make a pull request on GitHub.

0001.solution: Replace Power Supply, Test and replace MOSFETs, caps, and controller chip on V_12P0 rail

0002.solution: Replace Power Supply, Test and replace MOSFETs, caps, and controller chip on V_CPUCORE rail

0003.solution: Replace Power Supply, Test and replace MOSFETs, caps, and controller chip on V_GPUCORE rail

0010.explanation: HANA/ANA is not responding to reads or writes

0011.solution: Check heatsink, x-clamps, thermal paste, or fans. Corona: Check R4D3, R4D4, R4D5, R4D6, R4D7, R4D8 resistors if overheating happens instantly

0012.solution: Check heatsink, x-clamps, thermal paste, or fans. Corona: Check R4D3, R4D4, R4D5, R4D6, R4D7, R4D8 resistors if overheating happens instantly

0013.solution: Check heatsink, x-clamps, thermal paste, or fans. Corona: Check R4D3, R4D4, R4D5, R4D6, R4D7, R4D8 resistors if overheating happens instantly

0020.explanation: GPU_RST_DONE signal missing after seqUnReset time passed

0021.explanation: PCIE link did not enter L0 after seqUnReset time passed
0021.solution: Replace GPU, Southbridge, or Ethernet chip

0022.explanation: CPU did not send GetPowerUpCause to SMC

0023.explanation: Xenon: ANA_BCKUP is not responding to reads or writes. Others: Unknown error related to clockchip.
0023.solution: Xenon: Replace ANA_BCKUP, ANA, or Southbridge. Zephyr, Falcon, Jasper: Replace HANA. Trinity: Replace C4E3 cap, replace HANA. Corona: Replace C4E3 cap, replace Southbridge

0030.explanation: HANA/ANA temperature registers read as zero
0030.solution: Check for shorted resistors, replace HANA/ANA

0031.solution: Check for shorted resistors near Southbridge and GPU, replace GPU

0032.solution: Check/repair traces carrying CPU_RST_N. Slim: Check between C5R11, R4D4 and R4P5

0100.explanation: RAM Vendor ID wrong, or not detected

e16.explanation: RAM Vendor ID wrong, or not detected

0101.explanation: Could not write data for RAM read strobe training

e17.explanation: Could not write data for RAM read strobe training

0102.explanation: Memory read strobe delay training failed

e18.explanation: Memory read strobe delay training failed

0103.explanation: Memory write strobe delay training failed

e19.explanation: Memory write strobe delay training failed

0110.explanation: Memory address line failed or unresponsive

e20.explanation: Memory address line failed or unresponsive

0111.explanation: Memory data line failed or unresponsive

e21.explanation: Memory data line failed or unresponsive

1000.explanation: Kernel DVD drive communication timed out
1000.solution: Replace SATA cable to DVD drive, replace DVD drive PCB, replace Southbridge

e64.explanation: Kernel DVD drive communication timed out
e64.solution: Replace SATA cable to DVD drive, replace DVD drive PCB, replace Southbridge

1001.explanation: Kernel could not configure DVD drive for DMA mode
1001.solution: Replace SATA cable to DVD drive, replace DVD drive PCB, replace Southbridge

e65.explanation: Kernel could not configure DVD drive for DMA mode
e65.solution: Replace SATA cable to DVD drive, replace DVD drive PCB, replace Southbridge

1002.explanation: Kernel could not create DVD drive instance
1002.solution: Replace SATA cable to DVD drive, replace DVD drive PCB, replace Southbridge

e66.explanation: Kernel could not create DVD drive instance
e66.solution: Replace SATA cable to DVD drive, replace DVD drive PCB, replace Southbridge

1003.solution: Replace HDD, replace HDD port/cable, replace Southbridge

e67.solution: Replace HDD, replace HDD port/cable, replace Southbridge

1010.explanation: Kernel could not configure HDD for DMA mode
1010.solution: Replace HDD, replace HDD port/cable, replace Southbridge

e68.explanation: Kernel could not configure HDD for DMA mode
e68.solution: Replace HDD, replace HDD port/cable, replace Southbridge

1011.explanation: Kernel could not create HDD instance
1011.solution: Replace HDD, replace HDD port/cable, replace Southbridge

e69.explanation: Kernel could not create HDD instance
e69.solution: Replace HDD, replace HDD port/cable, replace Southbridge

1012.explanation: Kernel couldn't find HDD. Note: This error does not show up because a HDD is missing, it shows up when a HDD is detected, but can't be found
1012.solution: Replace HDD, replace HDD port/cable, replace Southbridge

e70.explanation: Kernel couldn't find HDD. Note: This error does not show up because a HDD is missing, it shows up when a HDD is detected, but can't be found
e70.solution: Replace HDD, replace HDD port/cable, replace Southbridge

1013.explanation: XAM could not find dash.xex on flash
1013.solution: Unplug HDD - if error clears, format or replace HDD. Otherwise, rebuild and reflash NAND

e71.explanation: XAM could not find dash.xex on flash
e71.solution: Unplug HDD - if error clears, format or replace HDD. Otherwise, rebuild and reflash NAND

1021.explanation: GPU to eDRAM High Speed Link failed, eDRAM faulty or unresponsive

e73.explanation: GPU to eDRAM High Speed Link failed, eDRAM faulty or unresponsive

1022.explanation: GPU to eDRAM High Speed Link failed, eDRAM faulty or unresponsive

e74.explanation: GPU to eDRAM High Speed Link failed, eDRAM faulty or unresponsive

1023.explanation: Southbridge could not communicate with Ethernet PHY over MDIO/MDC

e75.explanation: Southbridge could not communicate with Ethernet PHY over MDIO/MDC

1030.explanation: Ethernet PHY failed to reset correctly or complete reset

e76.explanation: Ethernet PHY failed to reset correctly or complete reset

1031.explanation: Could not read or write to Ethernet PHY

e77.explanation: Could not read or write to Ethernet PHY

1032.explanation: GPU is down revision, not supported on this board
1032.solution: Replace GPU with correct revision for board

e78.explanation: GPU is down revision, not supported on this board
e78.solution: Replace GPU with correct revision for board

1033.solution: Unplug HDD - if error clears, format or replace HDD. Otherwise, rebuild and reflash NAND

e79.solution: Unplug HDD - if error clears, format or replace HDD. Otherwise, rebuild and reflash NAND

1100.explanation: NAND LDV does not match eFUSE
1100.solution: Rebuild NAND with correct LDV. Phat: Check value of R6T3 resistor

e80.explanation: NAND LDV does not match eFUSE
e80.solution: Rebuild NAND with correct LDV. Phat: Check value of R6T3 resistor

2200.explanation: 2BL fusecheck: fuse LDV is greater than bootloader LDV

2211.explanation: Signature of the 3BL offset is invalid

2212.explanation: 3BL is not in the correct place on the NAND

2213.explanation: Signature of the 3BL header is invalid

2232.explanation: Processor issued non-RESET interrupt during boot chain

2301.explanation: Signature of CF or Kernel/Hypervisor patch offsets are invalid

2303.explanation: SHA of CF or Kernel/Hypervisor patch offsets are invalid
